experience.responsibility: Manage the delivery of the project releases on multiple environments. Expand front-end capabilities to new platforms and technologies. Collaborate with Product Designers, Product Managers, and other Team Leaders to plan, nurture, and implement an efficient and effective development process. Work on optimization in code base. Personnel selection, certification. Write technical documentation (admin guides), white papers, presentations.

Developing new user-facing features using React.js, Redux, Redux-saga. Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code. Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers
Creation of adaptive, cross-browser, optimized,easily supported templates for Prestashop in accordance with the design using HTML5, JS, jQuery, SCSS, Bootstrap, Smarty, PHP, Webpack.

Development and support of websites using HTML5, JS technology and SCSS with the COMPASS preprocessor. Creation of cross-browser, easily supported and productive solutions, using a modular approach. Using Pixel Perfect and goofle PageSpeed for quality evaluation
